text: we saw fire but didn't expect there
would be explosions I was actually quite
far away from the explosion site I'm a
security guard and I work at a factory I
was working at the security booth and
suddenly I heard the bang I lay down
immediately but still got injured the
security booth was destroyed completely
I saw a fire far away then certainly
there was an explosion my mind just went
blank
the first reaction was to run then I
heard another burst I escaped and I was
running away I got blood all over my
body my friend sent me to the hospital
we didn't know the situation we weren't
there at the time we just knew a
residential compound was badly damaged
after explosions occurred we couldn't
find her afterwards we were looking for
her the whole night we finally found her
in the morning I was resting at home and
around 11:00 the first blast wasn't very
strong but it woke me up I got up and
walked to the balcony to take a look the
second blast blew me away
